title: How to Make Hamburger Cupcakes

steps.headline: Bake brownies according to the box directions for a 13 x 9" inch pan.
steps.description: Let cool on a cooling rack.

steps.headline: Make cupcakes according to the box directions.
steps.description: Let cool on a cooling rack.

steps.headline: Prepare the buns and meat.
steps.description: Use a 2 inch (5.1 cm) circle diameter cookie cutter and cut out 24 circles from the brownies. Depending on each cupcake's height, cut them into halves or thirds. Add a brownie circle to the bottom of a cupcake.

steps.headline: Prepare the condiments.
steps.description: Divide the frosting container in three bowls, but put a little more in the third bowl. Reserve each bowl to one food color and drop 3 to 4 drops; making the green color have the most frosting. These will represent ketchup, mustard, and lettuce. Place each colored frosting in a zipper bag and snip off a corner tip. Lightly blob the ketchup and mustard first on the brownie meat. Design the lettuce with a squiggly design.

steps.headline: Place the top bun on gently.
steps.description: With a wet finger, dab a very thin layer of water on the top bun. Sprinkle sesame seeds and press down gently to hold them in.

text: Bake brownies according to the box directions for a 13 x 9" inch pan. Let cool on a cooling rack. Make cupcakes according to the box directions. Let cool on a cooling rack. Prepare the buns and meat. Use a 2 inch (5.1 cm) circle diameter cookie cutter and cut out 24 circles from the brownies. Depending on each cupcake's height, cut them into halves or thirds. Add a brownie circle to the bottom of a cupcake. Prepare the condiments. Divide the frosting container in three bowls, but put a little more in the third bowl. Reserve each bowl to one food color and drop 3 to 4 drops; making the green color have the most frosting. These will represent ketchup, mustard, and lettuce. Place each colored frosting in a zipper bag and snip off a corner tip. Lightly blob the ketchup and mustard first on the brownie meat. Design the lettuce with a squiggly design. Place the top bun on gently. With a wet finger, dab a very thin layer of water on the top bun. Sprinkle sesame seeds and press down gently to hold them in.
